markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 45 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 40 [Kob Moleg](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2323) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 352 **Perception** +27; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +30, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +29, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27 **Str** +9 **Dex** +5 **Con** +6 **Int** +1 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +6 **Items** _[+2 greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=380) spiked [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)_, _[+2 resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) [hide armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7)_, [sack with 5 rocks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=45) --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +30 **Ref** +27 **Will** +27 **HP** 295 **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**[Catch Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=7)** --- **Speed** 35 feet **Melee** _spiked greatclub_ +33 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d12+17 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +31 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d6+17 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Ranged** rock +29 ([Brutal](/Traits.aspx?ID=249), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d8+17 bludgeoning **Kob's Ruinous Strike** Kob Moleg makes a melee Strike. If he hits and deals damage, the target is [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. **[Throw Rock](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=38)** **Wide Swing** The hill giant makes a single greatclub Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the hill giant's multiple attack penalty.
name: Kob Moleg

text: Kob Moleg Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 45 Unspecific Lore : DC 43 Specific Lore : DC 40 Kob Moleg Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 352 Perception +27; low-light vision Languages Common, Jotun Skills Athletics +31, Intimidation +30, Survival +29, Warfare Lore +27 Str +9 Dex +5 Con +6 Int +1 Wis +5 Cha +6 Items +2 greater striking spiked greatclub , +2 resilient hide armor , sack with 5 rocks --- AC 39 Fort +30 Ref +27 Will +27 HP 295 Attack of Opportunity Reaction Catch Rock Reaction --- Speed 35 feet Melee Single Action spiked greatclub +33 (Backswing, reach 10 feet, Shove, versatile P), Damage 3d12+17 bludgeoning Melee Single Action fist +31 (Agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d6+17 bludgeoning plus Grab Ranged Single Action rock +29 (Brutal, range increment 120 feet), Damage 1d8+17 bludgeoning Kob's Ruinous Strike Two Actions Kob Moleg makes a melee Strike. If he hits and deals damage, the target is frightened 1, or frightened 2 on a critical hit. Throw Rock Single Action Wide Swing Single Action The hill giant makes a single greatclub Strike and compares the attack roll result to the ACs of up to two foes within its reach. This counts as two attacks for the hill giant's multiple attack penalty.
